description: Try our easy to follow Chop Chop Beef with Noodles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Noodle stir-fry,Quick & easy dinner,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Low salt,Low sugar,Low fat,Beef
name: Chop Chop Beef with Noodles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Empty hokkien noodles into a large bowl and cover with boiling water to soften.
Heat a wok or large frying pan over high heat and when very hot, add 1 tablespoon vegetable oil and swirl around to coat.
Cook beef stirfry strips in batches, cooking for 2 minutes until colour has changed. Remove to a plate and repeat with remaining beef.
Add 1 sliced onion and cook for 1 minute. Add half the stirfry vegetables, baby corn, snow peas and 1 tablespoon of water to wok and cook, tossing frequently for 1 minute until peas are bright green.
Return beef to wok with drained noodles and stirfry then add honey sesame sauce and toss over heat for 2 minutes until heated through. Serve.
